ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name != 'Partner', RecordType.Name != 'Alternate Channel', RecordType.Name != 'DPI', RecordType.Name != 'Global', RecordType.Name != 'Organization', $Profile.Name <> 'Frontier System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Frontier Auditor', $Profile.Name <> 'Data Analyst - DPI', $Profile.Name <> 'API - Integration', $Profile.Name <> '#CTF RegionalSalesMgr',
OR( ISBLANK( BillingCity ), ISBLANK( BillingCountry ), ISBLANK( BillingState ), ISBLANK( BillingStreet ), ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode) ) )
